laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Skin biopsy from left middle finger
laboratory_examinations.findings: Marked decrease in elastic fibers. A neutrophilic inflammatory infiltrate was not identified.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Skin biopsy from left upper arm
laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal number of elastic fibers and normal morphology under electron microscopy.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Ultrastructural examination of left middle finger skin specimen
laboratory_examinations.findings: Elastic fibers fragmented into multiple electron dense pieces.
Mean total broadband UVB dose of 11.8 J was delivered to the extremities. Patients 1, 2, and 4 had resolution of pruritus within the first 5 treatments.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 1 and 4 remain in remission 5 months and 7 months post-treatment, while patients 2 and 3 maintained clearance for 8 and 2.5 months respectively before recurrence.
